item.title: Cortney add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Cortney add a quote by Judy Schachner
item.description: "My ears are too beeg for my head. My head ees too beeg for my body. I am not a Siamese cat ... I AM A CHIHUAHUA!" <i>-- Skippyjon Jones (In his very best Spanish accent)</i>" -- Judy Schachner

item.title: Cortney add a quote by Jane Yolen & Bruce Coville
item.description: "The thing I want to know is, if you tell your brain not to do stuff... and it keeps doing it anyway, does that mean your mind has a mind of its own? And if it does, then who's in charge here, anyway?" -- Jane Yolen & Bruce Coville

item.title: Cortney add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "There's some muscle group around your shoulders that seizes up during the perfection dance and doesn't let go until you are asleep, or alone. Or maybe it never really lets go at all." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Cortney add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "And eventually being perfect became like carrying a backpack filled with bricks every single day.... What is really hard, and really amazing, is giving up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Cortney add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "With school turning out more runners, jumpers, racers, tinkerers, grabbers, snatchers, fliers, and swimmers instead of examiners, critics, knowers, and imaginative creators, the word 'intellectual,' of course, became the swear word it deserved to be." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Cortney add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Don't listen," whispered Faber. "He's trying to confuse. He's slippery. Watch out." -- Ray Bradbury
